item.title: ECLAT
item.dc:creator: killian
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row row_height_percent="0" back_image="1625" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" shift_y="0" css=".vc_custom_1456493348662{padding-top: 160px !important;padding-bottom: 160px !important;}"][vc_column column_width_percent="100" position_vertical="middle" align_horizontal="align_center" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" medium_width="0" shift_x="0" shift_y="0" z_index="0" width="1/1"][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic="h1" text_size="fontsize-700721" text_font="font-166752" text_weight="100" text_transform="uppercase" text_color="color-185624"]Eclat 2014[/vc_custom_heading][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent="0" back_color="color-jevc" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" shift_y="0" css=".vc_custom_1454062434847{margin-top: 15px !important;}"][vc_column column_width_percent="100" font_family="font-166752" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" medium_width="0" shift_x="0" shift_y="0" z_index="0" width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1454062531077{padding-top: 160px !important;}"][vc_column_text] The First white wine in the Electus line, Eclat, comes from the 2014 vintage. It is made from two Valais grape varieties : Petite Arvine and a grape that carries the name of an opera, Aida! But we know it better by its many other names - Green Heida, Païen, Savagnin in the Jura, Traminer in Alsace. This dry wine is remarkable for its elegance, beautifully pale colour with green highlights, aromatic notes of lemon, grapefruit and rose, the crispness that recalls the fresh chill of the mountains. Thanks to its lovely citrus aromatic persistence it is appreciated as an aperitif wine as well as one that lasts throughout a meal. The way in which Eclat is made is unique, adding a dash of originality to its character. The grapes are pressed in the manner of Champagne grapes, with only juice from the first pressing retained. The Wine then matures for nine months in new French oak barrels that have been heavily toasted. The goal is to eliminate any sweetness in order to underscore the tension and nervousness of the wine, to accentuate its taut and crystalline side.[/vc_column_text][vc_icon icon="fa fa-wine" icon_color="color-110210" background_style="fa-rounded" size="fa-2x" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fmolgcgsc.preview.infomaniak.com%2Fshop%2F||"][/vc_icon][vc_column_text]

Sold out

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_single_image media="374" media_width_percent="100"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent="0" back_color="color-jevc" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" shift_y="0" css=".vc_custom_1454062832129{margin-top: 0px !important;}"][vc_column column_width_percent="100" align_horizontal="align_center" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" medium_width="0" shift_x="0" shift_y="0" z_index="0" width="1/2"][vc_single_image media="381" media_width_percent="68" alignment="center"][vc_icon icon="fa fa-arrow-down2" icon_color="color-110210" background_style="fa-rounded" size="fa-2x" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fwww.valaismundi.ch%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2016%2F01%2Ffiche-technique_electus_valais-mundi_cmjn_traits-de-coupe_EN.pdf||"][/vc_icon][vc_column_text]

Download

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column column_width_percent="100" font_family="font-166752" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" medium_width="0" shift_x="0" shift_y="0" z_index="0" width="1/2"][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic="h4" text_size="h4" text_font="font-166752"]Blend[/vc_custom_heading][vc_separator sep_color="color-400583" type="dotted"][vc_column_text]Petite Arvine, Heïda[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic="h4" text_size="h4" text_font="font-166752"]Winemaking process[/vc_custom_heading][vc_separator sep_color="color-400583" type="dotted"][vc_column_text]

Grapes are pressed gently with a pneumatic press following the "méthode champenoise". With this swlow pressing, we select only the finest and purest juice. This pressing allows an extraction of only 50% of the yield to obtain the heart of the juice. The fermentation takes place integrally in new French oak barrel. The lees will be stireed for 6 months. No malolactif fermentation.

[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic="h4" text_size="h4" text_font="font-166752"]Maturation[/vc_custom_heading][vc_separator sep_color="color-400583" type="dotted"][vc_column_text]The wine is aged for 9 months in new French oak barrels. They have a large grained and benefits from a high level of toasting.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic="h4" text_size="h4" text_font="font-166752"]Soils[/vc_custom_heading][vc_separator sep_color="color-400583" type="dotted"][vc_column_text]The Valais offers a mosaïc of different terroirs. Chalk, chalky schists and limestone compose the selected plots.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic="h4" text_size="h4" text_font="font-166752"]Viticulture[/vc_custom_heading][vc_separator sep_color="color-400583" type="dotted"][vc_column_text]Depending on the vineyard and the grapes, the pruning is either in guyot simple or cordon. The grapes are selected in the vineyard and hand harvested when they still have a great level of acidity. They are harvested in small boxes to preserve the quality of each grape.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic="h4" text_size="h4" text_font="font-166752"]Alcoholic level[/vc_custom_heading][vc_separator sep_color="color-400583" type="dotted"][vc_column_text]14,5%[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent="0" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" shift_y="0" css=".vc_custom_1454074060936{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}" el_class="section"][vc_column width="1/3"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_single_image media="265" media_width_percent="10" alignment="center" media_link="url:%23||"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent="0" back_image="1635" overlay_color="color-jevc" overlay_alpha="18" gutter_size="3" shift_y="0" css=".vc_custom_1456493730340{padding-top: 160px !important;padding-bottom: 160px !important;}"][vc_column column_width_percent="100" position_vertical="middle" align_horizontal="align_center" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" medium_width="0" shift_x="0" shift_y="0" z_index="0" width="1/1"][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic="h1" text_size="fontsize-700721" text_font="font-166752" text_weight="100" text_transform="uppercase" text_color="color-185624"]From Mund to the World[/vc_custom_heading][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent="0" back_image="296" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" shift_y="0"][vc_column column_width_percent="100" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" medium_width="0" shift_x="0" shift_y="0" z_index="0" width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1454066336735{padding-top: 25px !important;padding-right: 35px !important;}"][vc_column_text]

Eclat, the white accomplice of Electus, expresses the freshness and minerality that mark the Alpine vineyards of Valais. The label must translate their collusion and this beautiful tension. It repeats the eyelet in the Mund tapestry. The flower is given a silver treatment whose blue highlights  symbolize the cold of the glaciers and the clean edges of the rocks. Its garland, so rich and densely sketched, evokes both the complexity and density of the aromas of this great white wine.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_single_image media="361" media_width_percent="100"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: ECLAT
item.dc:creator: killian
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row row_height_percent="0" back_image="1625" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" shift_y="0" css=".vc_custom_1456493433312{padding-top: 160px !important;padding-bottom: 160px !important;}"][vc_column column_width_percent="100" position_vertical="middle" align_horizontal="align_center" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" medium_width="0" shift_x="0" shift_y="0" z_index="0" width="1/1"][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic="h1" text_size="fontsize-700721" text_font="font-166752" text_weight="100" text_transform="uppercase" text_color="color-185624"]ECLAT 2014[/vc_custom_heading][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent="0" back_color="color-jevc" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" shift_y="0" css=".vc_custom_1454062434847{margin-top: 15px !important;}"][vc_column column_width_percent="100" font_family="font-166752" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" medium_width="0" shift_x="0" shift_y="0" z_index="0" width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1454062531077{padding-top: 160px !important;}"][vc_column_text]Mit dem vorzüglichen Jahrgang 2014 ist der erste Weisswein von Valais Mundi, ECLAT, erschienen, eine Assemblage der autochthonen Walliser Rebsorte Petite Arvine und der hier Heida oder Païen genannten Sorte, die im französischen Jura als Savagnin und im Elsass als Traminer bekannt ist. Der so kreierte trockene Weisswein besticht mit seiner Eleganz, einer hellgelben Robe mit grünen Reflexen, Aromen nach Zitrone, Grapefruit und Rosen sowie mit seiner Lebhaftigkeit, erfrischend wie eine kühle Brise in den Bergen. Dank seiner beeindruckenden Länge und der von Zitrusfruchtnoten beherrschten aromatischen Nachhaltigkeit schätzt man diesen Wein sowohl zum Aperitif wie als Begleiter eines ganzen Mahls. Gekeltert und ausgebaut wird der ECLAT auf einzigartige Weise, was ihm eine originelle Note verleiht. Die Trauben werden sortenrein nach einem in der Champagne angewandten schonenden Verfahren abgepresst, bei der man nur den Herzsaft der Beeren nutzt. Der Ausbau erfolgt während neun Monaten in neuen Barriques aus französischer Eiche, die stark ausgebrannt bzw. getoastet wurden. Dabei geht es darum, die Süsse zu eliminieren und stattdessen die Spannung und Rasse zu fördern, um das kristalline Element dieses Weins zu verstärken. Der ECLAT wird in kleinen Mengen erstellt und ist ein authentischer Schweizer Weisswein, dessen Charakter die Frische und die Reinheit der Frucht unterstützt. Er ist vor allem ein Klassiker und eine echte Gaumenfreude für Weingeniesser.

Eclat wird in kleinen Mengen erstellt und ist ein authentischer Schweizer Weisswein dessen Charakter die Frische und die Reinheit der Frucht unterstützt. Er ist vor allem ein Klassiker und eine echte Gaumenfreude für Weingeniesser.[/vc_column_text][vc_icon icon="fa fa-wine" icon_color="color-110210" background_style="fa-rounded" size="fa-2x" link="url:https%3A%2F%2Fshop.valaismundi.ch%2Fcollections%2Fvins%2Fproducts%2Feclat-2014||"][/vc_icon][vc_column_text]

Ausverfaukt

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_single_image media="374" media_width_percent="100"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent="0" back_color="color-jevc" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" shift_y="0" css=".vc_custom_1454062832129{margin-top: 0px !important;}"][vc_column column_width_percent="100" align_horizontal="align_center" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" medium_width="0" shift_x="0" shift_y="0" z_index="0" width="1/2"][vc_single_image media="381" media_width_percent="68" alignment="center"][vc_icon icon="fa fa-arrow-down2" icon_color="color-110210" background_style="fa-rounded" size="fa-2x" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fwww.valaismundi.ch%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2016%2F01%2Ffiche-technique_eclat14_valais-mundi_cmjn_traits-de-coupe_ALL.pdf||"][/vc_icon][vc_column_text]Herunterladen [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column column_width_percent="100" font_family="font-166752" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" medium_width="0" shift_x="0" shift_y="0" z_index="0" width="1/2"][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic="h4" text_size="h4" text_font="font-166752"]Rebsorten[/vc_custom_heading][vc_separator sep_color="color-400583" type="dotted"][vc_column_text]

Petite Arvine, Heïda

[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic="h4" text_size="h4" text_font="font-166752"]Weinbereitung[/vc_custom_heading][vc_separator sep_color="color-400583" type="dotted"][vc_column_text]Wie in der Champagne werden die Trauben mit einer pneumatischen Presse langsam gepresst. Dieses schonende Verfahren erlaubt, die im Herzen der Beeren vorhandenen feinsten Säfte zu gewinnen. Die Gärung erfolgt vollständig in neuen Barriques aus französischer Eiche. Während sechs Monaten wird der Hefesatz regelmässig aufgerührt. Ein biologischer Säureabbau findet nicht statt.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic="h4" text_size="h4" text_font="font-166752"]Ausbau[/vc_custom_heading][vc_separator sep_color="color-400583" type="dotted"][vc_column_text]Der Ausbau erfolgt während neun Monaten in neuen grobkörnigen französischen Barriques, die stark getoastet bzw. ausgebrannt wurden.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic="h4" text_size="h4" text_font="font-166752"]Böden[/vc_custom_heading][vc_separator sep_color="color-400583" type="dotted"][vc_column_text]Das Wallis bietet eine breite Vielfalt an Terroirs. Die Böden der ausgewählten Parzellen bestehen aus Kalk, Kalkschiefer und Lehm.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic="h4" text_size="h4" text_font="font-166752"]Rebbau[/vc_custom_heading][vc_separator sep_color="color-400583" type="dotted"][vc_column_text]Je nach Rebsorte und Weinberg erfolgt ein einfacher Guyot- oder Cordonschnitt. Die Trauben werden sorgfältig von Hand gelesen, solange die Beeren noch über eine gute Säure verfügen, und sortiert. Transportiert werden sie in kleinen Behältern, damit keine Beeren zerdrückt werden und die Qualität jeder einzelnen Traube bewahrt wird.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic="h4" text_size="h4" text_font="font-166752"]Alkohol[/vc_custom_heading][vc_separator sep_color="color-400583" type="dotted"][vc_column_text]12,7 %[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent="0" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" shift_y="0" css=".vc_custom_1454074060936{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}" el_class="section"][vc_column width="1/3"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_single_image media="265" media_width_percent="10" alignment="center" media_link="url:%23||"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent="0" back_image="1635" overlay_color="color-jevc" overlay_alpha="18" gutter_size="3" shift_y="0" css=".vc_custom_1456493776123{padding-top: 160px !important;padding-bottom: 160px !important;}"][vc_column column_width_percent="100" position_vertical="middle" align_horizontal="align_center" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" medium_width="0" shift_x="0" shift_y="0" z_index="0" width="1/1"][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic="h1" text_size="fontsize-700721" text_font="font-166752" text_weight="100" text_transform="uppercase" text_color="color-185624"]Schnee und Kristallweiss[/vc_custom_heading][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent="0" back_image="296" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" shift_y="0"][vc_column column_width_percent="100" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" medium_width="0" shift_x="0" shift_y="0" z_index="0" width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1454066336735{padding-top: 25px !important;padding-right: 35px !important;}"][vc_column_text]ECLAT, das weisse Pendant zum ELECTUS, bringt die Frische und Mineralität der alpinen Walliser Rebberge zum Ausdruck. Das Etikett soll diese Eigenschaften bildlich darstellen. Quelle der Inspiration ist wiederum der Wandteppich von Mund. Die in Silber und mit blauen Reflexen gedruckte Blume symbolisiert die Kälte der Gletscher und das scharfkantige Gestein. Ihre dichte und fein gezeichnete Krone steht für die Komplexität und Finesse der Aromen dieses grossen Weissweins.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_single_image media="361" media_width_percent="100"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: ELECTUS
item.dc:creator: killian
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row row_height_percent="0" back_image="1615" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" shift_y="0" css=".vc_custom_1456492618110{padding-top: 160px !important;padding-bottom: 160px !important;}"][vc_column column_width_percent="100" position_vertical="middle" align_horizontal="align_center" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" medium_width="0" shift_x="0" shift_y="0" z_index="0" width="1/1"][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic="h1" text_size="fontsize-700721" text_font="font-166752" text_weight="100" text_transform="uppercase" text_color="color-185624"]Electus 2011[/vc_custom_heading][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent="0" back_color="color-jevc" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" shift_y="0" css=".vc_custom_1454062434847{margin-top: 15px !important;}"][vc_column column_width_percent="100" font_family="font-166752" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" medium_width="0" shift_x="0" shift_y="0" z_index="0" width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1454062531077{padding-top: 160px !important;}"][vc_column_text]

Seven grape varieties were used for this complex wine made from superbly matured grapes that developed during a very hot summer. It is a wine with great potential, lusciously long in mouth and with beautiful depth. The aromas are a mix of liquorice, black fruit and dates, woven through refined tannins. It is very persistent with a distinguished appeal, very seductive. But it has only begun to show all its virtues.

[/vc_column_text][vc_icon icon="fa fa-wine" icon_color="color-110210" background_style="fa-rounded" size="fa-2x" heading_semantic="p" text_size="" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fmolgcgsc.preview.infomaniak.com%2Fshop%2F||"][/vc_icon][vc_column_text]

Get it !

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_single_image media="324" media_width_percent="100"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent="0" back_color="color-jevc" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" shift_y="0" css=".vc_custom_1454062832129{margin-top: 0px !important;}"][vc_column column_width_percent="100" align_horizontal="align_center" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" medium_width="0" shift_x="0" shift_y="0" z_index="0" width="1/2"][vc_single_image media="329" media_width_percent="68" alignment="center"][vc_icon icon="fa fa-arrow-down2" icon_color="color-110210" background_style="fa-rounded" size="fa-2x" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fwww.valaismundi.ch%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2016%2F01%2Ffiche-technique_electus_valais-mundi_EN.pdf||"][/vc_icon][vc_column_text]

Download

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column column_width_percent="100" font_family="font-166752" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" medium_width="0" shift_x="0" shift_y="0" z_index="0" width="1/2"][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic="h4" text_size="h4" text_font="font-166752"]Blend[/vc_custom_heading][vc_separator sep_color="color-149614" type="dotted"][vc_column_text]

Cornalin, Humagne Rouge, Diolinoir, Syrah, Merlot, Cabernet Sauvignon, Cabernet Franc

[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic="h4" text_size="h4" text_font="font-166752"]Winemaking process[/vc_custom_heading][vc_separator sep_color="color-149614" type="dotted"][vc_column_text]

Each grape is processed separately. Long cold-soaking prior to the spontaneous fermentation that occurs with the indigenous yeast. Malolactic fermentation occurs under the pomace cap. The blend is created and put in barrels for ageing.

[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic="h4" text_size="h4" text_font="font-166752"]Ageing & Maturation[/vc_custom_heading][vc_separator sep_color="color-149614" type="dotted"][vc_column_text]ELECTUS is aged during 18 months in new French oak barrels. It also benefits from almost one year of maturation in the bottle[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic="h4" text_size="h4" text_font="font-166752"]Soils[/vc_custom_heading][vc_separator sep_color="color-149614" type="dotted"][vc_column_text]Valais offers a mosaic of different terroirs. The selected parcels are composed of several soils such as schist, granit, limestone and marl.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic="h4" text_size="h4" text_font="font-166752"]Viticulture[/vc_custom_heading][vc_separator sep_color="color-149614" type="dotted"][vc_column_text]Depending on the vines and the grapes, the vine is trained in simple or double guyot or in cordon pruning. After a meticulous selection, the grapes are hand harvested in small boxes to preserve the quality of each crop.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic="h4" text_size="h4" text_font="font-166752"]Alcohol[/vc_custom_heading][vc_separator sep_color="color-149614" type="dotted"][vc_column_text]14,5% ABV[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent="0" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" shift_y="0" css=".vc_custom_1454064898932{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_single_image media="265" media_width_percent="10" alignment="center" media_link="url:%23||"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent="0" back_image="350" overlay_color="color-jevc" overlay_alpha="18" gutter_size="3" shift_y="0" css=".vc_custom_1454065230958{padding-top: 160px !important;padding-bottom: 160px !important;}"][vc_column column_width_percent="100" position_vertical="middle" align_horizontal="align_center" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" medium_width="0" shift_x="0" shift_y="0" z_index="0" width="1/1"][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic="h1" text_size="fontsize-700721" text_font="font-166752" text_weight="100" text_transform="uppercase" text_color="color-185624"]Electus 2010[/vc_custom_heading][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent="0" back_color="color-jevc" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" shift_y="0" css=".vc_custom_1454062434847{margin-top: 15px !important;}"][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_single_image media="353" media_width_percent="100"][/vc_column][vc_column column_width_percent="100" font_family="font-166752" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" medium_width="0" shift_x="0" shift_y="0" z_index="0" width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1454062531077{padding-top: 160px !important;}"][vc_column_text]

The first vintage of ELECTUS was the  2010, a year that was a great vintage in Valais. This rich and fruity wine, powerful yet contained thanks to its mature tannins, is ample evidence of this. Dominant and full aromas of black currant, chocolate, cedar and tobacco cover the palate. Decanted an hour before serving, it is perfect with warm meats, game and cheese. The grapes were harvested in mid-October; the wine was matured in barrels for 18 months before bottling. Is was then aged for another year and a half.

[/vc_column_text][vc_icon icon="fa fa-wine" icon_color="color-110210" background_style="fa-rounded" size="fa-2x" heading_semantic="p" text_size="" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fmolgcgsc.preview.infomaniak.com%2Fshop%2F||"][/vc_icon][vc_column_text]

Get it !

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent="0" back_color="color-jevc" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" shift_y="0" css=".vc_custom_1454062832129{margin-top: 0px !important;}"][vc_column column_width_percent="100" font_family="font-166752" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" medium_width="0" shift_x="0" shift_y="0" z_index="0" width="1/2"][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic="h4" text_size="h4" text_font="font-166752"]Blend[/vc_custom_heading][vc_separator sep_color="color-149614" type="dotted"][vc_column_text]

Cornalin, Humagne Rouge, Diolinoir, Syrah, Merlot, Cabernet Sauvignon, Cabernet Franc

[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic="h4" text_size="h4" text_font="font-166752"]Winemaking process[/vc_custom_heading][vc_separator sep_color="color-149614" type="dotted"][vc_column_text]

Each grape is processed separately. Long cold-soaking prior to the spontaneous fermentation that occurs with the indigenous yeast. Malolactic fermentation occurs under the pomace cap. The blend is created and put in barrels for ageing.

[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic="h4" text_size="h4" text_font="font-166752"]Ageing & Maturation[/vc_custom_heading][vc_separator sep_color="color-149614" type="dotted"][vc_column_text]ELECTUS is aged during 18 months in new French oak barrels. It also benefits from almost one year of maturation in the bottle[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic="h4" text_size="h4" text_font="font-166752"]Soils[/vc_custom_heading][vc_separator sep_color="color-149614" type="dotted"][vc_column_text]Valais offers a mosaic of different terroirs. The selected parcels are composed of  several soils such as schist, granit, limestone and marl.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic="h4" text_size="h4" text_font="font-166752"]Viticulture[/vc_custom_heading][vc_separator sep_color="color-149614" type="dotted"][vc_column_text]Depending on the vines and the grapes, the vine is trained in simple or double guyot or in cordon pruning. After a meticulous selection, the grapes are hand harvested in small boxes to preserve the quality of each crop.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic="h4" text_size="h4" text_font="font-166752"]Alcohol[/vc_custom_heading][vc_separator sep_color="color-149614" type="dotted"][vc_column_text]14,5% ABV[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column column_width_percent="100" position_horizontal="right" align_horizontal="align_right" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" medium_width="0" shift_x="0" shift_y="0" z_index="0" width="1/2"][vc_single_image media="830" media_width_percent="68" alignment="center"][vc_icon icon="fa fa-arrow-down2" icon_color="color-110210" background_style="fa-rounded" size="fa-2x" heading_semantic="p" text_size="" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fwww.valaismundi.ch%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2016%2F01%2Ffiche-technique_electus2010_valais-mundi_traits-de-coupe_EN.pdf||"][/vc_icon][vc_column_text]

Download

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent="0" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" shift_y="0" css=".vc_custom_1454064898932{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_single_image media="265" media_width_percent="10" alignment="center" media_link="url:%23||"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent="0" back_image="358" overlay_color="color-jevc" overlay_alpha="18" gutter_size="3" shift_y="0" css=".vc_custom_1454065933153{padding-top: 160px !important;padding-bottom: 160px !important;}"][vc_column column_width_percent="100" position_vertical="middle" align_horizontal="align_center" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" medium_width="0" shift_x="0" shift_y="0" z_index="0" width="1/1"][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic="h1" text_size="fontsize-700721" text_font="font-166752" text_weight="100" text_transform="uppercase" text_color="color-185624"]From Mund to the World[/vc_custom_heading][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent="0" back_image="296" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" shift_y="0"][vc_column column_width_percent="100" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" medium_width="0" shift_x="0" shift_y="0" z_index="0" width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1454066336735{padding-top: 25px !important;padding-right: 35px !important;}"][vc_column_text]

The ELECTUS label was inspired by a very old tapestry that hangs in the chapel of Mund, a village in upper Valais. It displays flowers, fruit, a bird to distribute seeds, and two interwoven letter, V and M, the initials of Valais Mundi, but also letters representing Vin and Montagne. The unusual and creative label illustrates both the attachment to tradition that is dear to Valais growers and their partnership with nature, whose benefits they reap.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_single_image media="361" media_width_percent="100"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: ELECTUS
item.dc:creator: killian
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row row_height_percent="0" back_image="1615" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" shift_y="0" css=".vc_custom_1456492672942{padding-top: 160px !important;padding-bottom: 160px !important;}"][vc_column column_width_percent="100" position_vertical="middle" align_horizontal="align_center" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" medium_width="0" shift_x="0" shift_y="0" z_index="0" width="1/1"][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic="h1" text_size="fontsize-700721" text_font="font-166752" text_weight="100" text_transform="uppercase" text_color="color-185624"]Electus 2011[/vc_custom_heading][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent="0" back_color="color-jevc" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" shift_y="0" css=".vc_custom_1454062434847{margin-top: 15px !important;}"][vc_column column_width_percent="100" font_family="font-166752" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" medium_width="0" shift_x="0" shift_y="0" z_index="0" width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1454062531077{padding-top: 160px !important;}"][vc_column_text]Dieser komplexe Wein zählt nicht weniger als sieben Rebsorten. Der Sommer 2011 zeichnete sich durch eine brütende Hitze aus, was zu besonders süssen Beeren führte. Ein tiefgründiger Wein mit langer Gaumenintensität und grossem Lagerungspotenzial. Die Aromen setzen sich aus Lakritz, schwarze Beeren und Datteln zusammen. Er verfügt über feine Tannine, einen intensiven Nachklang und einen eleganten sowie verführerischen Charakter. Mit den Jahren wird er noch zulegen denn er hat noch lange nicht alle seine Geheimnisse gelüftet…[/vc_column_text][vc_icon icon="fa fa-wine" icon_color="color-110210" background_style="fa-rounded" size="fa-2x" heading_semantic="p" text_size="" link="url:https%3A%2F%2Fshop.valaismundi.ch%2Fcollections%2Fvins%2Fproducts%2Felectus-millesime-2011||"][/vc_icon][vc_column_text]

Kaufen

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_single_image media="324" media_width_percent="100"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent="0" back_color="color-jevc" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" shift_y="0" css=".vc_custom_1454062832129{margin-top: 0px !important;}"][vc_column column_width_percent="100" align_horizontal="align_center" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" medium_width="0" shift_x="0" shift_y="0" z_index="0" width="1/2"][vc_single_image media="329" media_width_percent="68" alignment="center"][vc_icon icon="fa fa-arrow-down2" icon_color="color-110210" background_style="fa-rounded" size="fa-2x" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fwww.valaismundi.ch%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2016%2F01%2Ffiche-technique_electus_valais-mundi_DE.pdf||"][/vc_icon][vc_column_text]

Herunterladen

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column column_width_percent="100" font_family="font-166752" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" medium_width="0" shift_x="0" shift_y="0" z_index="0" width="1/2"][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic="h4" text_size="h4" text_font="font-166752"]Rebsorten[/vc_custom_heading][vc_separator sep_color="color-149614" type="dotted"][vc_column_text]

Cornalin, Humagne Rouge, Diolinoir, Syrah, Merlot, Cabernet Sauvignon, Cabernet Franc

[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic="h4" text_size="h4" text_font="font-166752"]Weinbereitung[/vc_custom_heading][vc_separator sep_color="color-149614" type="dotted"][vc_column_text]

Die verschiedenen Rebsorten werden einzeln gekeltert: lange und kühle Mazeration, spontane Gärung dank autochthonen Hefen und biologischer Säureabbau auf der Maische. Danach wird die Cuvée zusammengestellt und in Barriques abgefüllt

[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic="h4" text_size="h4" text_font="font-166752"]Ausbau[/vc_custom_heading][vc_separator sep_color="color-149614" type="dotted"][vc_column_text]18 monatiger Ausbau in neue französische Barriques aus Eiche. Danach erfolgt eine einjährige Flaschenreifung.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic="h4" text_size="h4" text_font="font-166752"]Böden[/vc_custom_heading][vc_separator sep_color="color-149614" type="dotted"][vc_column_text]Das Wallis bietet eine Vielfalt verschiedener Terroirs. Die Böden der ausgewählten Lagen bestehen aus Schiefer, Granit, Kalk und Mergel[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic="h4" text_size="h4" text_font="font-166752"]Rebbau[/vc_custom_heading][vc_separator sep_color="color-149614" type="dotted"][vc_column_text]Je nach Rebberg und Rebsorte erfolgt ein einfacher Guyot oder Kordonschnitt. Die von Hand ausgelesenen perfeckt gereiften Beeren, kommen in kleinen Behälter um die Qualität der Trauben zu bewahren.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic="h4" text_size="h4" text_font="font-166752"]Alkohol[/vc_custom_heading][vc_separator sep_color="color-149614" type="dotted"][vc_column_text]14,5%[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent="0" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" shift_y="0" css=".vc_custom_1454064898932{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_single_image media="265" media_width_percent="10" alignment="center" media_link="url:%23||"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent="0" back_image="350" overlay_color="color-jevc" overlay_alpha="18" gutter_size="3" shift_y="0" css=".vc_custom_1454065230958{padding-top: 160px !important;padding-bottom: 160px !important;}"][vc_column column_width_percent="100" position_vertical="middle" align_horizontal="align_center" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" medium_width="0" shift_x="0" shift_y="0" z_index="0" width="1/1"][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic="h1" text_size="fontsize-700721" text_font="font-166752" text_weight="100" text_transform="uppercase" text_color="color-185624"]Electus 2010[/vc_custom_heading][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent="0" back_color="color-jevc" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" shift_y="0" css=".vc_custom_1454062434847{margin-top: 15px !important;}"][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_single_image media="353" media_width_percent="100"][/vc_column][vc_column column_width_percent="100" font_family="font-166752" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" medium_width="0" shift_x="0" shift_y="0" z_index="0" width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1454062531077{padding-top: 160px !important;}"][vc_column_text]Im Jahr 2010, einem grossen Jahrgang im Wallis, entstand der erste ELECTUS. Die Mitte Oktober geernteten Rebsorten wurden einzeln vinifiziert und 18 Monate lang in Barriques ausgebaut. Nach der Assemblage folgte eine anderthalbjährige Flaschenreifung. Der reichhaltige und fruchtige Wein verfügt dank reifem Tannin über eine ausgewogene Kraft und bestätigt die Grösse des Jahrgangs. Aromen nach Cassis, Schokolade, Zeder und Tabak füllen und dominieren den gesamten Gaumen. Der ELECTUS 2010 ist ein idealer Begleiter von Fleisch, Wild und Käse und sollte eine Stunde vor dem Genuss dekantiert werden.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Ausverkauft

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent="0" back_color="color-jevc" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" shift_y="0" css=".vc_custom_1454062832129{margin-top: 0px !important;}"][vc_column column_width_percent="100" font_family="font-166752" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" medium_width="0" shift_x="0" shift_y="0" z_index="0" width="1/2"][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic="h4" text_size="h4" text_font="font-166752"]Rebsorten[/vc_custom_heading][vc_separator sep_color="color-149614" type="dotted"][vc_column_text]Cabernet Sauvignon, Humagne Rouge, Cornalin, Diolinoir, Merlot[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic="h4" text_size="h4" text_font="font-166752"]Weinbereitung[/vc_custom_heading][vc_separator sep_color="color-149614" type="dotted"][vc_column_text]Die verschiedenen Rebsorten werden einzeln gekeltert: lange und kühle Mazeration, spontane Gärung dank autochthonen Hefen und biologischem Säureabbau auf der Maische, gefolgt von mehreren Mazerationen und biologischem Säureabbau.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic="h4" text_size="h4" text_font="font-166752"]Ausbau[/vc_custom_heading][vc_separator sep_color="color-149614" type="dotted"][vc_column_text]Separater Ausbau in neuen Barriques aus französischer Eiche während 18 Monaten. Danach wird die Cuvée zusammengestellt, gefolgt von einer einjährigen Flaschenreifung[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic="h4" text_size="h4" text_font="font-166752"]Böden[/vc_custom_heading][vc_separator sep_color="color-149614" type="dotted"][vc_column_text]Das Wallis bietet eine Vielfalt verschiedener Terroirs. Die Böden der ausgewählten Lagen bestehen aus Schiefer, Granit, Kalk und Mergel.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic="h4" text_size="h4" text_font="font-166752"]Rebbau[/vc_custom_heading][vc_separator sep_color="color-149614" type="dotted"][vc_column_text]Je nach Rebberg und Rebsorte erfolgt ein einfacher Guyot oder Cordonschnitt. Die von Hand gelesenen perfekt gereiften Beeren werden in kleinen Behältern transportiert, um die Qualität der Trauben zu bewahren.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic="h4" text_size="h4" text_font="font-166752"]Alkohol[/vc_custom_heading][vc_separator sep_color="color-149614" type="dotted"][vc_column_text]14,5%[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column column_width_percent="100" position_horizontal="right" align_horizontal="align_right" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" medium_width="0" shift_x="0" shift_y="0" z_index="0" width="1/2"][vc_single_image media="830" media_width_percent="68" alignment="center"][vc_icon icon="fa fa-arrow-down2" icon_color="color-110210" background_style="fa-rounded" size="fa-2x" heading_semantic="p" text_size="" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fwww.valaismundi.ch%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2016%2F01%2Ffiche-technique_electus2010_valais-mundi_DE.pdf||"][/vc_icon][vc_column_text]

Herunterladen

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent="0" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" shift_y="0" css=".vc_custom_1454064898932{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_single_image media="265" media_width_percent="10" alignment="center" media_link="url:%23||"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent="0" back_image="358" overlay_color="color-jevc" overlay_alpha="18" gutter_size="3" shift_y="0" css=".vc_custom_1454065933153{padding-top: 160px !important;padding-bottom: 160px !important;}"][vc_column column_width_percent="100" position_vertical="middle" align_horizontal="align_center" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" medium_width="0" shift_x="0" shift_y="0" z_index="0" width="1/1"][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic="h1" text_size="fontsize-700721" text_font="font-166752" text_weight="100" text_transform="uppercase" text_color="color-185624"]Von Mund in die Welt[/vc_custom_heading][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent="0" back_image="296" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" shift_y="0"][vc_column column_width_percent="100" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" medium_width="0" shift_x="0" shift_y="0" z_index="0" width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1454066336735{padding-top: 25px !important;padding-right: 35px !important;}"][vc_column_text]Das Etikett des ELECTUS  ist von einem sehr alten Wandteppich inspiriert, der in der Kapelle von Mund, ein Dorf im Oberwallis, zu sehen ist. Die Darstellung zeigt Blumen, Früchte, einen Vogel, der deren Samen verstreuen soll, und die beiden verschlungenen Buchstaben: V und M, die Initialen von Valais Mundi aber auch von Vin et Montagne (Wein und Berg). Dieses originelle Etikett illustriert die Verbundenheit der Walliser Rebbauern mit der Tradition und ihre Nähe zur Natur, die sie ernährt, aus. Von Mund aus, die Quelle der Rhône, bis weit in die Welt, fliegt ein Vogel mit einer Weinbotschaft.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_single_image media="361" media_width_percent="100"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Winemaking
item.dc:creator: killian
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row row_height_percent="0" back_image="309" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" shift_y="0" css=".vc_custom_1454061255533{padding-top: 200px !important;padding-bottom: 200px !important;}"][vc_column column_width_percent="100" position_vertical="middle" align_horizontal="align_center" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" medium_width="0" shift_x="0" shift_y="0" z_index="0" width="1/1"][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic="h1" text_size="fontsize-700721" text_font="font-166752" text_weight="100" text_transform="uppercase" text_color="color-185624"] Winemaking [/vc_custom_heading][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent="0" back_image="296" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" shift_y="0"][vc_column column_width_percent="100" font_family="font-166752" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" medium_width="0" shift_x="0" shift_y="0" z_index="0" width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1453991220370{padding-top: 25px !important;padding-right: 35px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic="h3" text_size="h3" text_font="font-166752" text_color="color-196189"]The secret of time[/vc_custom_heading][vc_column_text]

Vinifying great red wines is a process that rarely permits their makers to dispense with tradition. Electus is no exception to this rule. And yet, conditions at the time it is made reveal new options, well known to the Bordeaux-style school of oenology.

The grape varieties are vinified separately because the grape varieties do not all ripen at the same time. The work in the barrel room starts with cold pre-fermentation macerations, to set the aromas. Alcoholic fermentations are generally quick, but with gentle extractions; thus new macerations are undertaken during a period of one or two months, and these are often the source of malolactic fermentations.

In January the wine begins to mature in Bordeaux barrels, a process that continues for 18 months. It is only when this is completed that each grape variety's wine is tasted and the blend, based on the character of each wine, is envisaged. The tastings that have preceded this, and decisions that may flow from it, carry no sense of urgency. Quite the opposite. Time, all the time that is necessary, rules over everything.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_single_image media="307" media_width_percent="100"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Weinbereitung
item.dc:creator: killian
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row row_height_percent="0" back_image="309" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" shift_y="0" css=".vc_custom_1454061255533{padding-top: 200px !important;padding-bottom: 200px !important;}"][vc_column column_width_percent="100" position_vertical="middle" align_horizontal="align_center" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" medium_width="0" shift_x="0" shift_y="0" z_index="0" width="1/1"][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic="h1" text_size="fontsize-700721" text_font="font-166752" text_weight="100" text_transform="uppercase" text_color="color-185624"] Weinbereitung [/vc_custom_heading][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent="0" back_image="296" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" shift_y="0"][vc_column column_width_percent="100" font_family="font-166752" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" medium_width="0" shift_x="0" shift_y="0" z_index="0" width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1453991220370{padding-top: 25px !important;padding-right: 35px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic="h3" text_size="h3" text_font="font-166752" text_color="color-196189"]Die Geheimnisse der Zeit[/vc_custom_heading][vc_column_text]

Das Keltern grosser Rotweine kann sich nur bedingt der Tradition entziehen und ELECTUS macht keine Ausnahme von dieser Regel. Dennoch wird er nach einigen neuen Ansätzen vinifiziert, zu denen auch die Bordelaiser Weinbau-Fachschule beitrug.

Da die Rebsorten nicht zur selben Zeit reif sind, werden sie separat vinifiziert. Die Kellerarbeit beginnt mit einer Kaltmazeration, um vor der Gärung möglichst viele Aromen und Farbstoffe zu extrahieren. Nach der meist schnellen, aber schonend extrahierenden alkoholischen Fermentation folgen erneut Mazerationen, die ein bis zwei Monate dauern und häufig zum biologischen Säureabbau führen.

Der Ausbau in Barriques beginnt im Januar und dauert achtzehn Monate. Erst danach werden diese Sortenweine verkostet, um die Assemblage anhand der Eigenschaften der verschiedenen Lose planen zu können. Bei den Verkostungen und den Entscheidungen, die sich daraus ergeben, lässt man sich Zeit. Denn die Zeit, die man dafür benötigt, ist hier der Massstab aller Dinge.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_single_image media="307" media_width_percent="100"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Viticulture
item.dc:creator: killian
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row row_height_percent="0" back_image="288" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" shift_y="0" css=".vc_custom_1453989490701{padding-top: 200px !important;padding-bottom: 200px !important;}"][vc_column column_width_percent="100" position_vertical="middle" align_horizontal="align_center" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" medium_width="0" shift_x="0" shift_y="0" z_index="0" width="1/1"][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic="h1" text_size="fontsize-700721" text_font="font-166752" text_weight="100" text_transform="uppercase" text_color="color-185624"] Viticulture [/vc_custom_heading][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent="0" back_image="296" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" shift_y="0"][vc_column column_width_percent="100" font_family="font-166752" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" medium_width="0" shift_x="0" shift_y="0" z_index="0" width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1453991220370{padding-top: 25px !important;padding-right: 35px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic="h3" text_size="h3" text_font="font-166752" text_color="color-196189"]Sun and vine[/vc_custom_heading][vc_column_text]

The exceptional exposure to sunlight enjoyed by the vines in Valais, up to 800 metres spread across the flanks of the mountains, allows some 50 grape varieties to ripen here. A veritable ampelographic conservatory, which only a handful of regions in the world are permitted to enjoy. Cornalin, Humagne, Diolinoir - grapes that are so little known elsewhere! ELECTUS brings together up to seven of these; the number varies from one vintage to another, with nature in charge of this decision. Nature alone.

ELECTUS offers a blend found nowhere else in the world, joining these beautiful Swiss grape varieties to their better-known cousins the Cabernets, Merlot and Syrah. Just as in an orchestra where each instrument plays its part in perfect harmony with its neighbour, a symphony is born of this blend. A true and honest harmony.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_single_image media="302" media_width_percent="100"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Weinbau
item.dc:creator: killian
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row row_height_percent="0" back_image="288" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" shift_y="0" css=".vc_custom_1453989490701{padding-top: 200px !important;padding-bottom: 200px !important;}"][vc_column column_width_percent="100" position_vertical="middle" align_horizontal="align_center" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" medium_width="0" shift_x="0" shift_y="0" z_index="0" width="1/1"][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic="h1" text_size="fontsize-700721" text_font="font-166752" text_weight="100" text_transform="uppercase" text_color="color-185624"] Weinbau [/vc_custom_heading][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent="0" back_image="296" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" shift_y="0"][vc_column column_width_percent="100" font_family="font-166752" overlay_alpha="50" gutter_size="3" medium_width="0" shift_x="0" shift_y="0" z_index="0" width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1453991220370{padding-top: 25px !important;padding-right: 35px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic="h3" text_size="h3" text_font="font-166752" text_color="color-196189"]Die Sonne und der Weinstock[/vc_custom_heading][vc_column_text]

Dank der aussergewöhnlichen Sonneneinstrahlung der Walliser Weinberge, die an den steilen Hängen bis auf 800 Meter Höhe ansteigen, reifen hier rund 50 verschiedene Rebsorten. Dieses Spektrum bildet eine regelrechte ampelografische Sammlung, wie sie nur wenige Rebberge bieten können. Gibt es irgendwo anders Rebsorten wie Cornalin, Humagne oder Diolinoir ? ELECTUS ist eine Assemblage von bis zu sieben Traubensorten, wobei diese Zahl je nach Jahrgang variiert: Befehlshaberin ist einzig und allein die Natur.

ELECTUS bildet eine weltweit einzigartige Cuvée, die grosse Walliser Rebsorten mit bekannteren internationalen Sorten wie Cabernet Sauvignon, Cabernet Franc, Merlot und Syrah vereint. So wie in einem Orchester, wurden die Partituren der verschiedenen Instrumente in Einklang gebracht, was zu einer Symphonie und einer wahrhaften Harmonie führte.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_single_image media="302" media_width_percent="100"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
